message.content:
Sure! Here's a sample meal plan for you for the next 7 days:
Monday:

  * Breakfast: Greek yogurt substitute (such as coconut yogurt) with berries and a sprinkle of granola.
  * Lunch: Quinoa salad with black beans, corn, cherry tomatoes, avocado, lime juice, and cilantro.
  * Dinner: Baked salmon with roasted sweet potatoes and steamed broccoli.

Tuesday:

  * Breakfast: Smoothie bowl with almond milk, mixed berries, spinach, and chia seeds.
  * Lunch: Hummus and veggie wrap with lettuce, tomato, cucumber, bell pepper, and whole wheat tortilla.
  * Dinner: Grilled chicken with roasted Brussels sprouts and quinoa pilaf.

Wednesday:

  * Breakfast: Avocado toast on whole grain bread with sliced tomatoes and a drizzle of olive oil.
  * Lunch: Turkey and cheese roll-ups with lettuce wraps.
  * Dinner: Beef stir-fry with mixed vegetables, brown rice, and soy sauce.

Thursday:

  * Breakfast: Oatmeal with almond milk and topped with sliced bananas and nuts (except cashews).
  * Lunch: Tuna salad with avocado on whole grain bread.
  * Dinner: Baked sweet potato fries with black bean sauce.

Friday:

  * Breakfast: Greek yogurt substitute with mixed berries, granola, and honey substitute (such as agave nectar or maple syrup).
  * Lunch: Black bean tacos with a side of guacamole and lettuce wraps.
  * Dinner: Grilled shrimp with roasted zucchini and couscous.

Saturday:

  * Breakfast: Smoothie bowl with almond milk, mixed berries, spinach, and chia seeds (except honey).
  * Lunch: Chickpea salad on whole grain pita bread with cucumbers, tomatoes, lettuce, and tahini dressing.
  * Dinner: Baked salmon with roasted asparagus and quinoa pilaf.

Sunday:

  * Breakfast: Greek yogurt substitute with mixed berries, granola, and honey substitute (such as agave nectar or maple syrup).
  * Lunch: Veggie and hummus wrap on whole grain tortilla with lettuce, tomato, cucumber, bell pepper.
  * Dinner: Grilled chicken with roasted sweet potatoes and steamed broccoli.

I hope you find this meal plan helpful! Remember to drink plenty of water throughout the day and choose healthy snacks such as fruits, nuts (except cashews), and hummus.
